name: Forty Thieves Solitaire!
description:
Boy Howdy's Forty Thieves Solitaire is a fun and very challenging patience game, and it's 100% FREE!

• Forty Thieves is a classic solitaire game where you try to move all the cards onto the eight foundations, building upwards from Aces with cards of the same suit. Sounds easy, but you'll have to carefully study the Tableau to figure out your best move...

• Fast and intuitive controls - Just tap on a card and watch it move by magic!
• Beautiful, easy to read cards!
• NEW - Low Vision Mode!

• No timers at all! Just relax and have fun!
• Unlimited undo support, with no penalties if you want to go back and try things a different way!

• 3 different Game Modes to keep things interesting!
• Fun Mode lets you drag stacks around the Tableau and have unlimited redeals
• Medium Mode you can only move single cards around the Tableau
• Hard Mode has no re-deals! Crazy!

• Global high score leaderboards with Game Center
• Your progress is automatically saved, all the time, so go ahead and take that call or jump out to any other apps - you can come back and pick up playing right where you left off!

• Sounds can be disabled if you want a quiet game
• You can even listen to your own music while you play

Thanks for playing!
Search for Boy Howdy to see all our free games!
